xtce:Parameter.name: VERSION
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Version Number (always 0)

xtce:Parameter.name: TYPE
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Type Indicator (0=telemetry)

xtce:Parameter.name: SEC_HDR_FLG
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Secondary Header Flag (always 1)

xtce:Parameter.name: PKT_APID
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Application Process ID

xtce:Parameter.name: SEQ_FLGS
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Grouping Flags (3=not part of group)

xtce:Parameter.name: SRC_SEQ_CTR
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Sequence Count (increments with each new packet)

xtce:Parameter.name: PKT_LEN
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet Length (number of bytes after Packet length minus 1)

xtce:Parameter.name: MET
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: CCSDS Packet 2nd Header Coarse Time (seconds)

xtce:Parameter.name: STARTID
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Ordinal number of the first IMAP spin in the block.

xtce:Parameter.name: ENDID
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Ordinal number of the last IMAP spin in the block, offset from STARTID.

xtce:Parameter.name: FLAGS
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Status flags indicating the quality of the produced histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: SWVER
xtce:Parameter.xtce:ShortDescription: Version of SW used for generation
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: GLOWS AppSW version number.

xtce:Parameter.name: SEC
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Start time, seconds field, of the histogram block. Specified as a number of IMAP seconds (since start from IMAP epoch as defined in GI ICD).

xtce:Parameter.name: SUBSEC
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Start time, subseconds field, of the histogram block. This value is obtained in linear interpolation from PPS data and is converted to internal SCIENCE format, where Subseconds timer wraps at 2000000 (2MHz counter).

xtce:Parameter.name: OFFSETSEC
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Stop time, seconds field, of the histogram block, offset. Specified as a number of IMAP seconds (since start time of the histogram block).

xtce:Parameter.name: OFFSETSUBSEC
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Stop time, subseconds field, of the histogram block, offset. This value is obtained in linear interpolation from PPS data and is converted to internal SCIENCE format, where Subseconds timer wraps at 2000000 (2MHz counter).

xtce:Parameter.name: GLXSEC
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Start time, seconds field, of the histogram block. Specified as a number of seconds (since start from IMAP epoch as defined in GI ICD). Value based on readouts from internal SCIENCE timer which is synchronized to IMAP only on power on/reset

xtce:Parameter.name: GLXSUBSEC
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Start time, subseconds field, of the histogram block. Value read from internal SCIENCE timer. Subseconds timer wraps at 2000000 (2MHz counter).

xtce:Parameter.name: GLXOFFSEC
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Stop time, seconds field, of the histogram block, offset. Specified as a number of IMAP seconds (since start from IMAP epoch as defined in GI ICD). Value based on readouts from internal SCIENCE timer, which is synchronized to IMAP clock only on power on/reset.

xtce:Parameter.name: GLXOFFSUBSEC
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Stop time, subseconds field, of the histogram block, offset. Value read from internal SCIENCE timer. Subseconds timers wraps at 2000000 (2MHz counter).

xtce:Parameter.name: SPINS
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Number of spins the SCIENCE block (histogram) is composed of minus 1 (0 - 1 spins, 1 - 2 spins, ...)

xtce:Parameter.name: NBINS
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Number of bins the SCIENCE histogram is composed of.

xtce:Parameter.name: TEMPAVG
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Average GLOWS Optical filter temperature observed during data collection for transmitted histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: TEMPVAR
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Variance observed on the GLOWS Optical filter temperature during data collection for transmitted histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: HVAVG
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Average CEM High Voltage bias observed during data collection for transmitted histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: HVVAR
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Variance observed on the CEM High Voltage bias during data collection for transmitted histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: SPAVG
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Average spin period observed during data collection for transmitted histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: SPVAR
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Variance observed on the spin period during data collection for transmitted histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: ELAVG
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Average event length observed during data collection for transmitted histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: ELVAR
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Variance observed on the event length during data collection for transmitted histograms.

xtce:Parameter.name: EVENTS
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Number of event in all bins (sum) of this histogram.

xtce:Parameter.name: HISTOGRAM_DATA
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Total histogram data counts. Each bin has 8 bits of data, with 3600 total bins.

xtce:Parameter.name: LEN
xtce:Parameter.xtce:ShortDescription: Number of packets in data set.
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Number of GLX_TMSCDE packets the block of Direct event data is composed of.

xtce:Parameter.name: SEQ
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Sequence number for this packet in the series of GLX_TMSCDE packets the block of Direct event data is composed of.
